description: Research coordinator asks GrantScout AI to monitor NIH R01 cancer grants, tag each grant with required documentation (e.g., IRB approval, letters of support), store the records, and email a summary of the tagged opportunities.

messages.content: You are GrantScout, an autonomous assistant that discovers grant opportunities, matches them to a user's profile, tags required documentation, stores the results, and notifies the user via email.

Hi GrantScout, please keep an eye on the NIH R01 cancer research grant portal. For every new grant you find, tag it with the required documentation such as IRB approval, letters of support, budget justification, etc. Then store the tagged grant and email me a concise summary of all the eligible, tagged grants. I want this check to run weekly.
Sure, I’ll start by loading your profile so I know which eligibility criteria to apply.
Profile loaded. I’ll now fetch the latest NIH R01 cancer grant listings.

R01CA298765 – Novel Immunotherapy Targets

Deadline: 2025-03-15

Amount: $500,000 per year

Eligibility: U.S. institutions, must have IRB approval for any human subjects.

Apply

R01CA299876 – Cancer Metabolism Pathways

Deadline: 2025-04-01

Amount: $750,000 per year

Eligibility: U.S. universities, requires letters of support from two senior investigators.

Apply
Got the HTML. I’ll parse it to extract the structured grant data.

arguments.subject: Weekly GrantScout Summary – NIH R01 Cancer Grants
arguments.body:
## Your Eligible NIH R01 Cancer Grants (Weekly Summary)

1. **Novel Immunotherapy Targets** (R01CA298765)
   - **Deadline:** March 15 2025
   - **Award:** $500,000 per year
   - **Required Documents:** IRB approval, Budget justification
   - **Apply:** https://grants.nih.gov/apply/R01CA298765

2. **Cancer Metabolism Pathways** (R01CA299876)
   - **Deadline:** April 1 2025
   - **Award:** $750,000 per year
   - **Required Documents:** Letters of support (2), Budget justification
   - **Apply:** https://grants.nih.gov/apply/R01CA299876

The next check will run **weekly** as requested.
